Signal Processing (pyrex.signals)¶

Module containing classes for digital signal processing.

All classes in this module hold time-domain information about some signals, and have methods for manipulating this data as it relates to digital signal processing and general physics.

Signal(times, values[, value_type]) Base class for time-domain signals.
EmptySignal(times[, value_type]) Class for signal with zero amplitude (all values = 0).
FunctionSignal(times, function[, value_type]) Class for signals generated by a function.
ZHSAskaryanSignal(times, particle, viewing_angle) Class for generating Askaryan signals according to ZHS parameterization.
ARVZAskaryanSignal(times, particle, …[, …]) Class for generating Askaryan signals according to ARVZ parameterization.
AskaryanSignal alias of ARVZAskaryanSignal
GaussianNoise(times, sigma) Class for gaussian noise signals with standard deviation sigma.
ThermalNoise(times, f_band[, f_amplitude, …]) Class for thermal Rayleigh noise signals.

PyREx

A Python package for simulation of neutrinos and radio antennas in ice. Version 1.7.0
